Effect: This syringe allows you to load it with a stimpak, the target gains the effects of the stimpak.
This syringe allows you to load it with a chem, the target gains the effects of the chem.
Target becomes poisoned for 3 turns and takes 1d6 poison damage at the start of each of their turns.
Target's DT is reduced by 3 for 1 minute.
Target becomes frightened for 3 rounds. (see page #)
Target spends all of its AP on its next turn to attack the nearest creature to it.
Target gains one level of Bleeding.
All creatures beyond 30 feet of the target creature become invisible to them for 1 minute.

If the target's endurance is a 4 or below, they fall unconscious for 1 hour. Otherwise, they become Dazed for their next two turns and fall unconscious for 1 hour at the end of their third turn. Creature's dazed in this way can remove this condition and prevent falling unconscious by using any chem with the stimulant property.
